name: Survive If You Can (Programmer Kat)
description:
A survival game where you have nothing much to do as its just beta 0.0.1, I challenged myself to make a survival game in a week so here we are. it has a lot of bugs and I worked 20hours on this. I'm just looking for suggestions and if I should continue working on this. thank you.

How to play:
  1. Hold "E" to open inventory
  2. WASD to move
  3. You can cut trees by looking at the branches and holding Mouse(0)
  4. u can buy saplings and place them and grow trees
  5. You can buy barriers and put them to stop the enemy for 10sec as they can break through.
  6. hold C and press mouse(0) To place barrier(it wont place anything if you dont have any barriers)
  7. apple will grow in apple tree every 100second, go under a tree and press E to collect them.
  8. you can eat apple from the inventory( hold E) 
  9. one apple = 1 health and you dont have any limitations of how many health u can have(atleast for now)
  10. the box is the shop

leave an review for an update and lemme know if I should keep working on it

PLEASE DOWNL0AD THE LATEST VERSION FOR ALL THESE FEATURES
